text: {{Infobox settlement | name = Lusail City | native_name = مدينة لوسيل | native_name_lang = ar | settlement_type = City | image_skyline = | imagesize = | image_alt = | image_caption = Top to bottom, left to right: office buildings on Alad Al Sharqi Street; high rises on Al Seenar Street; skyline with the Lusail Marina Iconic Development in the center; Lusail Interchange Arch; boats docked in Lusail Marina | image_flag = | flag_alt = | image_seal = | seal_alt = | image_shield = | shield_alt = | nickname = | motto = | image_map = | map_alt = | map_caption = |coordinates = |coordinates_footnotes = |elevation_footnotes = |elevation_m = 5 |elevation_ft = | subdivision_type = Country | subdivision_name = | subdivision_type1 = Municipality | subdivision_name1 = Al Daayen | subdivision_type2 = Zone | subdivision_name2 = Zone 69, Zone 70 | subdivision_type3 = District no. | subdivision_name3 = 123 | area_total_km2 = 38 | population_footnotes = | population_total = 198,600 | population_as_of = 2022 | population_density_km2 = auto | population_demonym = | population_note = | timezone1 = | utc_offset1 = | timezone1_DST = | utc_offset1_DST = | postal_code_type = | postal_code = | area_code_type = | area_code = | iso_code = | website = Lusail.com | footnotes = }} Lusail (Arabic: لوسيل, ALA-LC: Lūsayl) is the second-largest city in Qatar. It is located on the coast, in the southern part of the municipality of Al Daayen. Lusail is located about 23 kilometres (14 mi) north of the city centre of Doha, just north of the West Bay Lagoon, on over 38 square kilometres (15 sq mi). ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:Geography of Qatar
title: Lusail
